creator: Balamurali.Bhaeeman@gmail.com
text:
I am getting the below error .
It works some time , but fails some tme . I am not able to trace what the isue 
is. Can you please help me..

[3/6/06 4:43:59:153 EST]  13651ed SystemOut     O [ERROR] Could not load 
external SVG: An invalid XML character (Unicode: 0x90) was found in the prolog 
of the document.
[3/6/06 4:43:59:155 EST]  13651ed SystemOut     O [ERROR] Error while creating 
area : No ImageReader for this type of image 
(file:/usr/local/ccms/ua5/sle/jclass/properties/xsl/CA/statestreet.jpg)

creator: Balamurali.Bhaeeman@gmail.com
text:
This below error occurs only when xsl FO is dynamically called from servlet,but 
never seem to get simulated when diretly invoking on the commandline.

The web application is deployed on was5 and error occurs only some times ie., 
one time if the server is started image comes up, and sometimes if the server 
is restarted the eror is thrown..

creator: gadams@apache.org
text: please provide a test input FO file, an output PDF file (if any), and console output (if any); otherwise this bug will be moved to resolved+invalid

creator: gadams@apache.org
text: resetting severity from major to normal pending further review

text: resetting P2 open bugs to P3 pending further review
